item.title: 2023 11 16 Playbook, Rules and Strategies
item.description: Rule 0: Golden rule https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golden_Rule Rule 1-3: Laws of robotics https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laws_of_robotics https://xkcd.com/1613/ Rule 4: Innocent until proven guilty Game theory strategies: Determine cooperation outcome Scenario improvable though cooperation? 1. Yes: continue 2. No, walk away* *For example No-Win-Scenario or you would only loose. If Yes, build trust, apply copy kitten: https://ncase.me/trust/ When trust is established with copy kitten engage in deeper commitments Don’t fall trap to the sunk-cost-fallacy, cut off resource drains and don’t ‘Hope’ Hope and Fear are the mind killer.

item.title: 2023 10 06 Project progress
item.description: My rust project is on track Not much more to say there. Day by day i’m making progress. The ‘Anyhow’ crate is great. Living and loving developing. Blogging feels like procrastinating still, so i better get back to coding and physically working out. This is nice, but actually doing ‘something’ i can quantify, like the compiler no longer yelling at me, there being a product or thing i can label ‘done’ or my mind agreeing with that it’s progress makes me feel more productive.
